item.title: My experience as PhD student in Mathematics
item.description: In my first post I would like to share with you my experience as PhD in Mathematics in Berlin. Starting a PhD is not easy. First of all, you have to apply to many places that might be famous for your research area but it is hard to picture how the experience will look like when you finally get your acceptance letter. This is why the Berlin Mathematical School (BMS) compiles testimonials in their website, to show prospective students what doing a Math PhD in Berlin is like.
